shows.title: How Ethical Living CAN Change The World
shows.desc:
Can our individual actions really change the world? Ethical and sustainable living can reduce climate change and promote social justice, argues Safia Minney. This in turn puts pressure on business and government to truly engage with the Sustainable Development Goals.

Safia Minney is an award-winning social entrepreneur and founder of People Tree, which has pioneered sustainable and fair trade fashion.

shows.title: Social Entrepreneurs Workshop
shows.desc:
A brilliant opportunity for anyone and everyone involved in social enterprise and business for good to come and workshop with leading global ethical entrepreneur Safia Minney around how we can create and sustain genuinely values-led and ethical end-to-end businesses.

Safia Minney is an award-winning social entrepreneur and founder of People Tree, which has pioneered sustainable and fair trade fashion.
